name: Divine Quadratus
description:
You are a square left stranded alone in an arena full of malicious shapes out to take your life. Your foes arrive in waves with unique stats and scaling implied to ensure your demise is to come.

Fire your trusty bullet out to slay your foes to gain score but be cautious as for you are chained to your bullet. Killing enemies refill your ammo, make them pay for their sins with their mortal lives.

Credits:

All game music is provided by https://www.zapsplat.com

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 event.
